contexts.context: ...of me at Christmas ,especially since it's a little <mark>einsam</mark> here. Am beginning to know some local inhabitants....
...chairs with the red covers, "it´s a bit <mark>einsam</mark> here. And I wanted to write and tell you...
...dem Sankt Radegunder Bauern,gehört,der sein <mark>einsames</mark> Nein zu dem Arierstaat sagte und geköpft wurde...
